data.synopsis:
- **Billing Period:** September 1 — September 30, 2025

- **Major Sections (in order):**
  - Document header/banner
  - Payment due information (balances, due dates)
  - Account information (previous/current balances)
  - Payment schedule illustration (minimum payment vs. full payment timelines)
  - Terms & conditions/licensee information
  - Financial literacy/disclaimer (bankruptcy, interest consequences)
  - Issuer information
  - Payments section
  - Transactions section
  - Legal/Additional information

- **Document Type:** Apple Card Statement (confirmed by header and content)
key_sections: Payment schedule illustration (minimum payment vs. full payment timelines)
